channel.title: A few problems with my server [Delta]
channel.description:
I'm using a delta source and i'm not really sure how to fix this problem. If some one freezes me and runs away, I can hit them with melee from a few squares away. I'm pretty sure there is a fix for this I just don't know how to do it.
The second problem is kind of hard to explain so i have a video of it. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tq4euZuFYpY
The second problem doesn't seem to happen all the time for me but my hoster is saying it happens every time he tries to spec.
The last one isn't that big but i still want to fix it. When i equip infinity boots i turn invisible. If anyone can help me with any of these problems that would be great.

item.title: A few problems with my server [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @united_pkzz united pkzz
item.description:
@united_pkzz wrote:

get a coder or get new source.

Read full topic
item.source: A few problems with my server [Delta]
